original_title: Newsline with Dr. Nandalal Weerasinghe: What next for Sri Lanka’s economy?
original_body_lines: Colombo (News 1st) – Watch a News 1st exclusive interview with Governor of the Central Bank of Sri Lanka Dr. Nandalal Weerasinghe, as he discusses what's in store for Sri Lanka now that the International Monetary Fund has approved it's Extended Fund Facility programme.
Unions strike against attempts to privatize the Ceylon Petroleum Corporation
Sri Lanka to receive USD 7 billion loan from two foreign banks
Passenger ships between India and Sri Lanka to commence from end of April
